title: Biden Administration Adds Insulin to Drug Price Negotiation List in Major Blow to Big Pharma
description:
“This was an unexpected victory in a long fight against an illegal cartel of three corporations who have raised their insulin prices in lockstep.”

The post Biden Administration Adds Insulin to Drug Price Negotiation List in Major Blow to Big Pharma appeared first on The Intercept.

title: The FBI Has Collected DNA Profiles for 21 Million People
description:
China and the U.S. are collecting the the same proportion of their populations’ DNA profiles — and the FBI wants to double its budget to get even more.

The post The FBI Has Collected DNA Profiles for 21 Million People appeared first on The Intercept.
